vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκμυκτηρ-ίζω,
hold in derision, mock at, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to sneer at, ridicule
to mock, deride, scoff at, sneer at Lk. 16:14; 23:35*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 嗤之以鼻, 輕蔑嘲笑, 嘲弄 (路 16:14, 23:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 嗤之以鼻, 轻蔑嘲笑, 嘲弄 (路 16:14, 23:35)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chế nhạo; chê cười. ἐκ (G1537) + μυκτηρίζω (G3456)
